tools.name: Stop
tools.description: Immediately stop all ongoing motion of the agent.

tools.name: motion_delta
tools.description:
Move or rotate the agent by applying a 6-DoF pose delta [x, y, z, rot_x, rot_y, rot_z].

Translation (continuous):
- x > 0 → move forward
- x < 0 → move backward
- y > 0 → strafe left
- y < 0 → strafe right
- z > 0 → move up
- z < 0 → move down

Rotation (discrete values):
- rot_z = +90 → turn left
- rot_z = -90 → turn right
- rot_y = -30 → look up
- rot_y = +30 → look down

Translation values (x, y, z) may take any real number.
Rotation values (rot_y, rot_z) should use the discrete values shown above.
rot_x is typically unused.

tools.name: Navigation
tools.description: Navigate to a target position on the environment map using the built-in navigation system. The agent's current position is used as the starting point.

tools.name: Pickup
tools.description: Pick up a target object in the agent's view. The object must be visible and support pickup.

tools.name: Place
tools.description: Place the object currently held by the agent at a suitable nearby location in the environment. The agent must be holding an object before using this action.

tools.name: Open
tools.description: Open an openable object such as a drawer, cabinet, or door in the agent's view.

tools.name: Close
tools.description: Close an openable object that is currently open.

tools.name: ToggleOn
tools.description: Turn on an interactable device or appliance, such as a light or switch.

tools.name: ToggleOff
tools.description: Turn off an interactable device or appliance.

tools.name: Slice
tools.description: Slice a target object using a suitable tool. The agent must be holding a slicing tool such as a knife.

tools.name: Dirty
tools.description: Mark a target object as dirty.

tools.name: Clean
tools.description: Clean a target object.

tools.name: Fill
tools.description: Fill a container object with liquid.

tools.name: Empty
tools.description: Empty the contents of a container object.

tools.name: Pour
tools.description: Pour liquid from the object currently held by the agent onto a target object or location. The held object must contain liquid.

tools.name: Break
tools.description: Break or damage a target object.

tools.name: BehindAboveOn
tools.description: Switch the camera to a third-person behind-and-above perspective.

tools.name: BehindAboveOff
tools.description: Switch the camera back to first-person view.

tools.name: OpenProgressCheck
tools.description: Retrieve the agent's current task progress, including subgoals and completion status.

tools.name: SelectOid
tools.description: Select or highlight an object based on a text query. The query should be a string describing the object (e.g., 'mug', 'tomato'). The system resolves the best matching object internally.

tools.name: SearchObject
tools.description: Search for an object using a text query and adjust the camera view to focus on the most relevant matching object.

tools.name: Text
tools.description: Send a text message or annotation as part of the interaction.

tools.name: Speech
tools.description: Play a recorded or synthesized speech message. The message may be provided as text or an audio file.

tools.name: Beep
tools.description: Play a beep sound. This action always plays three beeps.
